Member Function Documentation

addAttribute ( $  attr,
$  value,
$  a = array() 
)

Add an attribute.

Attributes are not not unique and multiple attributes can exist with the same name and value.

Parameters:
$attr Attribute name. This is non-casesensitive, but it will be converted to uppercase.
$value Attribute value.
$a Extra subattributes.
